# python3-edcapi

## Install via pip

	pip install edcapi
	
## Install via repository

Download repository from GitLab

	pip install git+https://gitlab.lrz.de/edc/python3-edcapi.git#egg=edcapi

or

	pip install git+ssh://git@gitlab.lrz.de/edc/python3-edcapi.git#egg=edcapi

install via pip:

	pip install python3-edcapi/

## Documentation

A detailed documentation of the _edcapi_ Python package can found [here](https://https://edc-api.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
